Surya Narayanan Viswanathan 
Atlanta, GA | 770-256-8185 | kvsunnynarayen@gmail.com  
 
Surya is a seasoned IT Leader with over 20+ years of cross-functional, leadership experience in Information 
Technology which includes Analysis, Development, QA, Configuring, Deployment, Technical support in 
wide range of industries, products and services. Delivered many high-quality products with orchestrated 
matrix teams across NA, APAC, EMEA 
 
TCS - Atlanta, GA                                                             May 2021 – Present 
 
As  a Delivery Manager - BFSI,  leading  multiple  accounts  across  US  East  & Canada for  the  PEGA 
development, testing, deployment programs.  
 
I manage US East & Canada 15+ PEGA Accounts Delivery, Relationship Management, Team Enablement, 
Revenue Growth, Solution Accelerator, Support and Ensuring Customer Success & Satisfaction. As a part 
of TCS Enterprise Application Services (EAS) managing team of 100+ talented technology experts, business

of TCS Enterprise Application Services (EAS) managing team of 100+ talented technology experts, business 
consultants and associates who design and deliver innovative solutions to customers for various domain 
like Banking, Financial Systems and Insurance. 
 
Additional responsibilities like Account Management, mining, scoping, estimation, resource loading and 
setting up span of control and P&L. Providing consultation on IT/ QA Transformation, Customer Success, 
QA specific platform engineering and Integration, Business Process Automation, E2E seamless Automation 
with Cycle-Time-Reduction, Additional Coverage and Product Automation  
 
Lead a multi-million transformation programs for diversified streams of “Managed Services”, “Managed 
Capacity: and “Enterprise Mobility” to #1 Airlines.

Capacity: and “Enterprise Mobility” to #1 Airlines.

Surya Narayanan Viswanathan                                                                                                        Page 2 
Capgemini, Atlanta, GA                                            May 2016 – Dec 2019 
 
As an Engagement Manager – Quality Engineering, responsible for consulting and delivering for various 
platinum accounts spanning across Retail/ CPG, Telcom/Media and Automobile sectors.  
 
• Oversee P&L, cost optimization, margins improvement, process improvement

• Assessed, Supported and Marketed Quality Engineering Programs for major clients 
• SAP Cloud Migration Project – Lead 50 members testing services in Functional, Integrations,

• Assessed, Supported and Marketed Quality Engineering Programs for major clients 
• SAP Cloud Migration Project – Lead 50 members testing services in Functional, Integrations, 
Performance, ~1000 Middleware remediation & testing automation. Migrate 112 SAP 
applications and 23 bolt-on across 21 landscapes to Virtustream (VS) private cloud.  
• Lead the 30-member automation and performance team to deliver the overall E2E automation 
and performance testing across 12 business areas / 11 functional areas catering to 12 bottlers 
and across `400 plants

Atos Syntel, Chennai, India / Atlanta, GA                             Jul 2010 – Apr 2016 
 
As a Senior Project Manager – Testing Services - handled the Supply Chain and Merchandizing portfolio

Atos Syntel, Chennai, India / Atlanta, GA                             Jul 2010 – Apr 2016 
 
As a Senior Project Manager – Testing Services - handled the Supply Chain and Merchandizing portfolio 
for world largest home improvement account. Primarily involved in Account Management which includes 
mining and client handling.  
 
• Handled the Supply chain, Merchandizing – portfolio and delivered 250+ projects 
• Converted 80% of the team from QA to Hybrid QE 
• Incubated, demonstrated and implemented company’s Tools & Accelerators and saved 1M$ 
• Implemented Shift Left Testing to reduce time to market 
• Demonstrated experience in baking test automation and quality into CI/CD pipeline 
• Executed POC and successfully implemented the IT-Ops solution for incident management 
 
INFOGAIN, Bangalore, India                                             Jun 2004 – Jun 2010 
 
As an Assistant Project Manager – V&V, I was primarily involved in Project Management which includes

INFOGAIN, Bangalore, India                                             Jun 2004 – Jun 2010

Surya Narayanan Viswanathan                                                   Page 3 
NEC, Bangalore, India                                                        Mar 2002 – May 2004  
 
As a Senior Technical support for the flagship projects AFIS (Automated Fingerprint Identification

the team for benchmark of the AFIS product at NCRB 
 
 
1995-2002 Surya held various roles and responsibilities at the capacity of System Analyst, EDP Manager 
and for clients in Learning, Realtors markets.
